requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['sku_ids']="36144305"
params['item_id']=332589771
params['end_date']="2018-10-03"
params['begin_date']="2018-08-27"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.item.hotel.room.query', '3.0.0', 'GET', params=params, files=files)

'36144305', 'item_id' => '332589771', 'end_date' => '2018-10-03', 'begin_date' => '2018-08-27', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(

);
echo '
